teams.name: CCBC Anthropology
teams.description: Students in Nina Brown's anthropology classes along with anyone else who wants to help us out.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Kiva on Wheels
teams.loan_because: Whether hauling people or products, wheels make profit possible.  With transportation loans, Kiva entrepreneurs are on the move - from rickshaws to heavy trucks, motorbikes, taxis, buses, vans and tractors.
teams.description: We support all manner of transport as well as the support team: parts suppliers, body and tire shops, gas stations.  We are drivers!

teams.name: Women Who Lend To Shirtless Men
India
teams.loan_because: "What we should aim at is the creation of people power, which is opposed to the power of violence and is different from the coercive power of state." - Vinoba Bhave
teams.description:
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty.

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe. We love India - therefore we are the Kiva Team India. We love to use the Kiva concept to provide loans in India ! http://www.kiva.org/india

Funding loans from India: http://www.kiva.org/lend?countries=IN

http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva/2012/08/15/kiva-launches-in-india.html

teams.name: Belgium
teams.loan_because: Its a nice way to help the beneficiaries of the loans create their own business and hopefully improve their lives.
teams.description: Team of the Belgian citizens & residents and of the fans of Belgian Waffles, Chocolate & Beers !

teams.description: A bunch of Christians from Bristol.

teams.name: New México USA
teams.loan_because:
New Mexicans have always been generous people, no matter what their background. We are always ready to help our vecinos (neighbors) even if they do not live in our country.  
          

Los Nuevos Mexicanos han sido siempre gente generoso, no importa quién son. Estamos siempre listos para ayudar a nuestro neighbors (vecinos) incluso si no viven en nuestro país.
teams.description:
We are New México!

¡Somos Nuevo México!

teams.name: Trolltech Foundation
teams.loan_because: we believe that empowering people to help themselves is the path to true and lasting prosperity.
teams.description:
The Trolltech Foundation was founded by the first 8 founders and employees of the company Trolltech. We transferred company shares to the foundation with the philosophy that we should not forget the world around us if we had success. We achieved great success and when the company was sold to Nokia the foundation sold its shares.

We are a non-profit charitable foundation and aim to help people in developing countries. We think Kiva is a great way to achieve this.
